verses.roman:
ei līlā mahāprabhura raghunātha-dāsa
gaurāṅga-stava-kalpavṛkṣe kariyāche prakāśa

synonyms: ei līlā—this pastime; mahāprabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; raghunātha-dāsa—Raghunātha dāsa Gosvāmī; gaurāṅga-stava-kalpa-vṛkṣe—in his book known as Gaurāṅga-stava-kalpavṛkṣa; kariyāche prakāśa—has described very nicely.
translation: This pastime of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's has been described very nicely by Raghunātha dāsa Gosvāmī in his book known as Gaurāṅga-stava-kalpavṛkṣa.
